18#include "DMBitMatrixParser.h"
19#include "DMDefaultPlacement.h"
20#include "DMVersion.h"
21#include "BitMatrix.h"
22#include "ByteArray.h"
23
24#include <cstdint>
25#include <stdexcept>
26
27namespace ZXing {
28namespace DataMatrix {
29
30//private final BitMatrix mappingBitMatrix;
31//private final BitMatrix readMappingMatrix;
32//private final Version version;
33
34const Version*
35BitMatrixParser::ReadVersion(const BitMatrix& bits)
36{
37 return Version::VersionForDimensions(bits.height(), bits.width());
38}
39
40/**
41* <p>Extracts the data region from a {@link BitMatrix} that contains
42* alignment patterns.</p>
43*
44* @param bitMatrix Original {@link BitMatrix} with alignment patterns
45* @return BitMatrix that has the alignment patterns removed
46*/
47static BitMatrix ExtractDataRegion(const Version& version, const BitMatrix& bitMatrix)
48{
49 int symbolSizeRows = version.symbolSizeRows();
50 int symbolSizeColumns = version.symbolSizeColumns();
51
52 if (bitMatrix.height() != symbolSizeRows) {
53 throw std::invalid_argument("Dimension of bitMarix must match the version size");
54 }
55
56 int dataRegionSizeRows = version.dataRegionSizeRows();
57 int dataRegionSizeColumns = version.dataRegionSizeColumns();
58
59 int numDataRegionsRow = symbolSizeRows / dataRegionSizeRows;
60 int numDataRegionsColumn = symbolSizeColumns / dataRegionSizeColumns;
61
62 int sizeDataRegionRow = numDataRegionsRow * dataRegionSizeRows;
63 int sizeDataRegionColumn = numDataRegionsColumn * dataRegionSizeColumns;
64
65 BitMatrix result(sizeDataRegionColumn, sizeDataRegionRow);
66 for (int dataRegionRow = 0; dataRegionRow < numDataRegionsRow; ++dataRegionRow) {
67 int dataRegionRowOffset = dataRegionRow * dataRegionSizeRows;
68 for (int dataRegionColumn = 0; dataRegionColumn < numDataRegionsColumn; ++dataRegionColumn) {
69 int dataRegionColumnOffset = dataRegionColumn * dataRegionSizeColumns;
70 for (int i = 0; i < dataRegionSizeRows; ++i) {
71 int readRowOffset = dataRegionRow * (dataRegionSizeRows + 2) + 1 + i;
72 int writeRowOffset = dataRegionRowOffset + i;
73 for (int j = 0; j < dataRegionSizeColumns; ++j) {
74 int readColumnOffset = dataRegionColumn * (dataRegionSizeColumns + 2) + 1 + j;
75 if (bitMatrix.get(readColumnOffset, readRowOffset)) {
76 int writeColumnOffset = dataRegionColumnOffset + j;
77 result.set(writeColumnOffset, writeRowOffset);
78 }
79 }
80 }
81 }
82 }
83 return result;
84}
85
86/**
87* <p>Reads the bits in the {@link BitMatrix} representing the mapping matrix (No alignment patterns)
88* in the correct order in order to reconstitute the codewords bytes contained within the
89* Data Matrix Code.</p>
90*
91* @return bytes encoded within the Data Matrix Code
92* @throws FormatException if the exact number of bytes expected is not read
93*/
94ByteArray
95BitMatrixParser::ReadCodewords(const BitMatrix& bits)
96{
97 const Version* version = ReadVersion(bits);
98 if (version == nullptr) {
99 return {};
100 }
101
102 BitMatrix dataBits = ExtractDataRegion(*version, bits);
103
104 ByteArray result(version->totalCodewords());
105 auto codeword = result.begin();
106
107 VisitMatrix(dataBits.height(), dataBits.width(), [&codeword, &dataBits](const BitPosArray& bitPos) {
108 // Read the 8 bits of one of the special corner/utah symbols into the current codeword
109 *codeword = 0;
110 for (auto& p : bitPos) {
111 *codeword <<= 1;
112 *codeword |= static_cast<uint8_t>(dataBits.get(p.col, p.row));
113 }
114 ++codeword;
115 });
116
117 if (codeword != result.end())
118 return {};
119
120 return result;
121}
122
123} // DataMatrix
124} // ZXing
